ComicInfo.Summary:
The mysterious crime figure called Dapper is really getting under the Goon's skin. But is there someone else pulling the strings of this deadly foe? Or is the Goon paranoid from too many blows to the head? Plus, for the hardcore collectors out there, Albatross offers a special limited edition
gloss card stock cover of this issue with art by the legendary creator of Bone, Jeff Smith!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Eric Powell | 1 | Var | Cardstock Variant Cover | Jeff Smith | 2 |
